name: Fancy Hands
description:
Get your time back! We are the fastest, most affordable virtual assistant service in the US. No negotiating, no waiting, just send us your requests and we'll get to work immediately. From the personal to the professional, we're ready to get to work today! 
- We call up your cable/phone company and get your bill fixed
- We'll research the best places to hold your work dinner and book the restaurant
- We can find the best SAT tutor for you kid
Slate: “I believe this is the definition of heaven”
New York Times: "Fancy Hands is good"​
The company was started by Ted Roden in 2010.
